pages.title: Kamen Rider Knuckle
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Gaim Gaiden: Kamen Rider Knuckle (2015, V-Cinema film)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:gaim/devices/sengoku_driver_knuckle)Sengoku Driver (Knuckle)$(/l)$(br2)This form can be used by $(l:gaim/riders/gaim)Gaim,$(/l) $(l:gaim/riders/ryugen)Ryugen,$(/l) $(l:gaim/riders/zangetsu)Zangetsu,$(/l) $(l:gaim/riders/bravo)Bravo,$(/l) and $(l:gaim/riders/knuckle)Knuckle$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Punch IV$(li)Strength VII (with empty hand)$(li)Speed II$(li)Haste II$(li)Saturation
